subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following battles took place during the establishment of the Marwar State?
question_hi: मर्वाई राज्य का समाधान के लिए किस परम्पतिमान पोलिस के समाधान पर हुआ था या नहीं?
explanation_en: The Battle of Mewar (1562) took place during the establishment of the Marwar State.
explanation_hi: मेवार (1562) - राजनेवाली मर्वार स्थान के बैंग का किनार
explanation: The Battle of Mewar in 1562 marked the establishment of Marwar State under Rana Kumbha of Mewar.
explanation_hi: मेवार के 1562 में राजनेवाली मेवार का किनार
